data-mc-speed="60"

The basic version, with scrolling content from right to left

  • Monarch
  • Benassi
  • Air Max
  • Cortez
  • Jordan
  • Presto
  • Roshe
  • Tempo
  • Vomero
  • Pegasus
data-mc-speed="60" data-mc-direction="ltr"

data-mc-direction="ltr" — changes the scroll direction from left to right

  • Monarch
  • Benassi
  • Air Max
  • Cortez
  • Jordan
  • Presto
  • Roshe
  • Tempo
  • Vomero
  • Pegasus
data-mc-speed="60" data-mc-direction="auto"

data-mc-direction="auto" — automatically changes the scrolling direction of the component when scrolling the page

  • Monarch
  • Benassi
  • Air Max
  • Cortez
  • Jordan
  • Presto
  • Roshe
  • Tempo
  • Vomero
  • Pegasus
data-mc-speed="60" data-mc-skew="-4"

data-mc-skew="-4" — transforms the component by tilting it along the Y axis (it is acceptable to use a positive or negative value)

  • Monarch
  • Benassi
  • Air Max
  • Cortez
  • Jordan
  • Presto
  • Roshe
  • Tempo
  • Vomero
  • Pegasus
data-mc-speed="5" data-mc-min="500"

data-mc-min="500" — sets the minimum screen width at which the animation will be played (when the breakpoint intersects, the cloned elements will be removed and the component styles will be cleared)

  • Jordan
data-mc-speed="5" data-mc-max="500"

data-mc-max="500" — sets the maximum screen width at which the animation will be played (when the breakpoint intersects, the cloned elements will be removed and the component styles will be cleared)

  • Jordan
